dcterms:creator: Christopher Hidey
Kathleen McKeown
dcterms:description: A dataset of 1,083,520 contrastive comment pairs drawn from Reddit, filtered to include only pairs where the respondent has significantly modified the original post.
dcterms:title: Reddit Dataset

dcterms:creator: Christopher Hidey
Kathleen McKeown
dcterms:description: A dataset of 2,625 comments paired with 5 new contrastive responses generated by annotators, used for evaluating the model's performance on generating contrastive claims.
dcterms:title: Mechanical Turk Dataset
